Verses: 1 pinbu Simson Kaasaavukkup Poi, Ange Oru Vesiyaik Kandu, Avalidaththil Ponaan.

2 appozhudhu: Simson Inge Vandhirukkiraan Endru Kaasaa Ooraarukku Sollappattadhu. Avargal: Kaalaiyil Velichchamaagirapodhu Avanaik Kondru Poduvom Endru Solli, Avanai Valaindhukondu Raamuzhudhum Avanukkaagap Pattanavaasalil Padhivirundhu Raamuzhudhum Pesaadhirundhaargal.

3 simson Naduraaththirimattum Paduththirundhu, Naduraaththiriyil Ezhundhu, Pattanaththu Vaasal Kadhavugalaiyum Adhin Irandu Nilaigalaiyum Pidiththu, Thaazhppaalodekoodap Perththu, Than Tholin Mel Vaiththu, Ebironukku Edhireyirukkira Malaiyin Uchchikku Sumandhu Konduponaan.
4 adharkuppinbu Avan Sorek Aatrangaraiyil Irukkira Theleelaal Ennum Perulla Oru Sthreeyode Snegamaayirundhaan.

5 avalidaththirkup Pelistharin Adhipadhigal Poi: Nee Avanai Nayampanni, Avanudaiya Magaa Balam Edhinaale Undaayirukkiradhu Endrum, Naangal Avanaik Katti Sirumaippaduththugiradharku Edhinaale Avanai Merkollalaam Endrum Arindhukol; Appozhudhu Naangal Ovvoruvarum Aayiraththu Nooru Vellikkaasu Unakkuk Koduppom Endraargal.
6 appadiye Theleelaal Simsonaip Paarththu: Un Magaa Balam Edhinaale Undaayirukkiradhu, Unnai Sirumaippaduththa Unnai Edhinaale Kattalaam Endru Nee Enakku Sollavendum Endraal.
7 adharku Simson: Ularaadha Pachchaiyaana Ezhu Aganinaark Kayirugalaale Ennaik Kattinaal, Naan Balatchayamaagi, Matra Manushanaippol Aaven Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Pelistharin Adhipadhigal Ularaadha Pachchaiyaana Ezhu Agani Naark Kayirugalai Avalidaththirkuk Konduvandhaargal; Avaigalaal Aval Avanaik Kattinaal.

9 padhivirukkiravargal Araiveettile Kaaththirukkumpodhu, Aval: Simsone Pelisthar Unmel Vandhuvittaargal Endraal; Appozhudhu, Sanal Noolaanadhu Neruppuppattavudane Itruppogiradhupola, Avan Andhak Kayirugalai Aruththuppottaan; Avan Balam Innadhinaale Undaayirukkiradhu Endru Ariyappadavillai.
10 appozhudhu Theleelaal Simsonaip Paarththu: Idho, Ennaip Pariyaasam Panni, Enakkup Poisonnaai; Ippodhum Unnai Edhinaale Kattalaam Endru Enakku Sollavendum Endraal.
11 adharku Avan: Idhuvaraikkum Oru Velaikkum Vazhangaadhirukkira Pudhukkayirugalaal Ennai Irugak Kattinaal, Naan Balatchayamaagi, Matra Manushanaippol Aaven Endraan.

12 appozhudhu Theleelaal, Pudhukkayirugalai Vaangi, Avaigalaal Avanaik Katti, Simsone, Pelisthar Unmel Vandhuvittaargal Endraal; Padhivirukkiravargal Araiveettil Irundhaargal; Aanaalum Avan Than Buyangalil Irundha Kayirugalai Oru Noolaippola Aruththuppottaan.

13 pinbu Theleelaal Simsonaip Paarththu: Idhuvaraikkum Ennaip Pariyaasampanni, Enakkup Poisonnaai; Unnai Edhinaale Kattalaam Endru Enakku Sollavendum Endraal; Adharku Avan Nee En Thalaimayirin Ezhu Jadaigalai Nesavunool Paavode Pinni Vittaal Aagum Endraan.
14 appadiye Aval Seydhu, Avaigalai Aaniyadiththu Maatti: Simsone, Pelisthar Unmel Vandhuvittaargal Endraal; Avan Niththiraivittezhumbi, Nesavu Aaniyaiyum Noolpaavaiyumkoodap Pidungikkonduponaan.

15 appozhudhu Aval Avanaip Paarththu: Un Irudhayam Ennodu Iraadhirukka, Unnai Snegikkiren Endru Nee Eppadi Sollugiraai? Nee Indha Moondruvisaiyum Ennaip Pariyaasam Panninaai Allavaa, Unnudaiya Magaabalam Edhinaale Undaayirukkiradhu Endru Enakku Sollaamarponaaye Endru Solli,
16 ippadi Avanai Dhinamdhinam Than Vaarththaigalinaale Nerukki Alattik Kondirukkiradhinaal, Saagaththakkadhaai Avan Aaththumaa Visanappattu,

17 than Irudhayaththaiyellaam Avalukku Velippaduththi: Savaragan Kaththi En Thalaiyin Mel Padavillai; Naan En Thaayin Karppaththil Pirandhadhumudhal Dhevanukkendru Nasareyanaanavan; En Thalaisiraikkappattaal, En Balam Ennai Vittuppom; Adhinaale Naan Balatchayamaagi, Matra Ellaa Manusharaippolum Aaven Endru Avalidaththil Sonnaan.

18 avan Than Irudhayaththaiyellaam Thanakku Velippaduththinadhaith Theleelaal Kandapodhu, Aval Pelistharin Adhipadhigalukku Aal Anuppi: Indha Oruvisai Vaarungal, Avan Than Irudhayaththaiyellaam Enakku Velippaduththinaan Endru Sollachchonnaal; Appozhudhu Pelistharin Adhipadhigal Vellikkaasugalaith Thangal Kaiyil Eduththukkondu Avalidaththukku Vandhaargal.

19 aval Avanaith Than Madiyile Niththirai Seyyappanni, Oruvanai Azhaiththu, Avan Thalaimayirin Ezhu Jadaigalaiyum Siraippiththu, Avanai Sirumaippaduththath Thodanginaal; Avan Balam Avanaivittu Neengitru.
20 appozhudhu Aval: Simsone Pelisthar Unmel Vandhuvittaargal Endraal; Avan Niththiraivittu Vizhiththu, Karththar Thannaivittu Vilaginadhai Ariyaamal, Eppodhumpola Udharippottu Veliye Poven Endraan.
21 pelisthar Avanaip Pidiththu, Avan Kangalaip Pidungi, Avanaik Kaasaavukkuk Kondupoi, Avanukku Irandu Vengala Vilangupottu Siraichchaalaiyile Maavaraiththukkondirukka Vaiththaargal.
22 avan Thalaimayir Siraikkappatta Pinbu, Thirumbavum Mulaikkath Thodangitru.

23 pelistharin Prabukkal: Nammudaiya Pagaignanaagiya Simsonai Nammudaiya Dhevan Nammudaiya Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar Endru Solli, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Thaagonukku Oru Periya Pali Seluththavum, Sandhosham Kondaadavum Koodi Vandhaargal.

24 janangal Avanaik Kandavudane: Nammudaiya Dhesaththaip Paazhaakki, Nammil Anegaraik Kondrupotta Nammudaiya Pagaignanai Nammudaiya Dhevan Namadhu Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar Endru Solli, Thangal Dhevanaip Pugazhndhaargal.

25 ippadi Avargal Manamagizhchchiyaayirukkumpodhu: Namakku Munbaaga Vedikkaikaattumpadikku, Simsonaik Koottikkondu Vaarungal Endraargal; Appozhudhu Simsonai Siraichchaalaiyilirundhu Koottikkonduvandhaargal. Avargalukku Munbaaga Vedikkai Kaattinaan; Avanaith Thoongalukku Naduve Niruththinaargal.
26 simson Thanakkuk Kailaagukoduththu Nadaththugira Pillaiyaandaanode, Veettaith Thaangugira Thoongalile Naan Saaindhukondirukkumpadi Avaigalai Naan Thadavippaarkkattum Endraan.

27 andha Veedu Purusharaalum Sthreegalaalum Niraindhirundhadhu; Ange Pelistharin Sagala Prabukkalum, Veettinmel Purusharum Sthreegalumaaga Erakkuraiya Moovaayiramper, Simson Vedikkai Kaattugiradhaip Paarththukkondirundhaargal.

28 appozhudhu Simson Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Naan En Irandu Kangalukkaaga Ore Theervaiyaaip Pelisthar Kaiyile Pazhivaangumpadikku, Indha Oruvisai Maaththiram Ennai Ninaiththarulum, Dhevane, Balappaduththum Endru Solli,
29 simson Andha Veettaith Thaangi Nirkira Irandu Naduththoongalil, Ondraith Than Valadhukaiyinaalum, Matrondraith Than Idadhukaiyinaalum Pidiththukkondu,

30 en Jeevan Pelistharodekooda Madiyakkadavadhu Endru Solli, Balamaai Saaikka, Andha Veedu Adhil Irundha Prabukkalmelum Ellaa Janangalmelum Vizhundhadhu; Ivvidhamaai Avan Uyirodirukkaiyil Avanaal Kollappattavargalaippaarkkilum, Avan Saagumpodhu Avanaal Kollappattavargal Adhigamaayirundhaargal.

31 pinbu Avan Sagodhararum, Avan Thagappan Veettaaranaivarum Poi, Avanai Eduththukkonduvandhu, Soraavukkum Esthaavelukkum Naduve Avan Thagappanaagiya Manovaavin Kallaraiyil Adakkampanninaargal. Avan Isravelai Irubadhuvarusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
